name: Public Politic Communications Ltd.
goal: Independent consultancy providing political communication services and strategic advice to clients, including  representation to EU institutions.
interests: Development, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
The primary policy areas followed are:
- External relations and foreign policy
- Neighbourhood and Enlargement policy
- Trade policy
- Security and defence policy
- Justice and Fundamental Rights
- Development policy
- Humanitarian aid policy
- Democracy support policy
